üöÄ Projects

MetadataAI - metadataai.app

  • Create professional headlines, captions, descriptions and keywords for any image in seconds.
  • Lead developer of Flutter based MacOS and Windows application to help photographers quickly tag their photos with appropriate Metadata for better distribution.
  • Designed a GOLang backend to process images, parse metadata and consult various LLM's about their content.
  • Built a backend system to quickly track usage, decrement credits, accept Stripe payments, and more.

PixationAI

  • AI-powered content generation from partner images using advanced image analysis and machine learning techniques.

Newscom Dashboard - Private Internal Application

  • TypeScript and Python platform processing millions of usage points per month with advanced image identification.
  • Built on AWS with extensive Lambda and SQS integration.

Newscom AI - newscom.ai

  • AI-generated image marketplace with Stripe purchasing and token-based downloads.
  • Multi-tenant capabilities with OpenAI API integration.

Mainstream Data Image CDN

  • Go application providing fast image access and manipulation with JWT validation.
  • Supports face detection and alignment while cropping images.

Pixation Images - pixationimages.com

  • TypeScript + Express backend with Next.js frontend for image aggregation.
  • Uses Elasticsearch and various AWS services.

CPA Alerts - cpaalerts.com

  • GraphQL API with React frontend and Material UI.
  • Intuit OAuth integration for QuickBooks Online data.

Ski Utah App (4.9 stars on App Store)

  • React Native application with Django backend for ski resort information.
  • Built with Expo platform for iOS and Android.

League of Legends Universe - Universe

  • Lead frontend developer for React site handling massive global traffic.
  • Complex static site generation for traffic and SEO optimization.
